title: Herb Savor Original
description: The Prepara Herb Savor will prolong the life of your fresh herbs for up to 3 weeks.
cleaned_text: Nothing makes your meals taste better than the freshest ingredients. The Prepara Herb Savor will prolong the life of your fresh herbs for up to 3 weeks. Key features: - Easily refillable water well base - Removable stainless steel rinsing basket - Slim, non-slip base - Fits in refrigerator door SKU: 11.02" H, 1.25 lbs Product in packaging: 7.28" D x 3" W x 11.54" H, 1.68 lbs Materials: BPA free plastic with stainless steel tray To clean: Top-rack dishwasher safe
